== Padavayal (627609) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Padavayal is a village in the [[Mannarkad]] taluka of [[Palakkad]] district with an area of 32026 hectares and harbouring 1719 households with total population of 6144 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Palakkad]] is at a distance of 70 km. Male population is 3053 and female population is 3091. Scheduled Caste Population is 167 and Scheduled Tribes population is 4403. Census Location Code of the village is 627609<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
